author: Jeremy Plecko
comment: Great watchface...needs help.  The screen doesn't always dim properly...almost like it freezes up.  If a notification pops up and then dims it will be fine.  If it freezes, nothing updates on the screen which makes the time a bit inaccurate.  I really want to like this watchface but if it can't tell me the proper time when not "active" it is a bit worthless.  Huawei watch.

author: Joseph Lin
comment: Beautiful and functional. One of the best faces out there.

author: Yong Soon Shong
comment: Double setting icon on my watch face.
title: Double setting icon

author: Josh Wheat
comment: Looks cool.  Make it a square one and I will buy it in a minute.

reply.content: Hello! The square version is now available: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vizor.wmwatch.vcomet.square.pr

title: Square please ..

reply.content: Hello. Could you describe the problem in more detail? Have you done anything to would have shown? For example, install a program WatchMaker?

author: Shawn Roth
comment: If have this installed on my Sony SW3....and it looks great...I just wish you had a square version of this..I would pay for that....

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. Version for square watches will be necessary, but somewhat later.

title: Looks amazing..
